description: The “Core” libraries from the official [p5.js Libraries page](https://p5js.org/libraries/).
details: This category includes only the `p5.sound` library. It does not include the `p5.accessibility` library because, as [noted on that library's home page](https://github.com/processing/p5.accessibility), it is obsolete.

description: “Community” libraries from the official [p5.js Libraries page](https://p5js.org/libraries/).
details: This category excludes a couple of libraries that could not be automatically included: .

description: Libraries that are not specific to p5.js, but are particularly useful for p5 sketches.
Libraries that are not on the official [p5.js Libraries page](https://p5js.org/libraries/), but appear to be useful and well-maintained.
details: I've also included my own libraries from [Oliver’s p5.js libraries](https://osteele.github.io/p5.libs/).
